title: Verify: Implement AuditTrail Event Logging for Lane C
description:
Run automated tests for task T-006.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Extend the AuditTrail to support structured logging of all Lane C policy decisions, overrides, and relevant session events. Ensure events are stored in append-only JSONL format and support replay for session timelines.
Criteria:
- AuditTrail logs all Lane C policy decisions and overrides
- Events are stored in append-only JSONL files
- AuditTrail supports replaying session timelines (transcript, decisions, tool calls)
- AuditTrail respects configuration for transcript/audio storage
acceptance_criteria: AuditTrail logs all Lane C policy decisions and overrides
Events are stored in append-only JSONL files
AuditTrail supports replaying session timelines (transcript, decisions, tool calls)
AuditTrail respects configuration for transcript/audio storage
